formattedAddress: 68 Bayard St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 68 Bayard St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: The doctor was fine but their operation is problematic. I had been seeing dr Roland for 3 to 4 years. Every time I had to wait for a very long time from the appointment times. Last year annual check up, I waited at the clinic for 3 hours. This year, therefore, I scheduled the earliest appointment time of the day to ensure no such long delay. However, 15 mins in the clinic, the receptionist told me the doctor won’t be there until another hr later. I said I cannot wait this long as it is a work day, I needed to be back to work. She then suggested someone else in the clinic to do the annual check up (including Pap smear) if I didn’t want to wait. She didn’t tell me the alternative she suggested was NOT a doctor but a medical assistant. I only found out from over-hearing her conversation with another patient who was also asked to accept treatment from a medical assistant rather than the doctor.

originalText.text: The front desk has a good service attitude and the doctors are more attentive. From there, they checked for conception, then became pregnant, and gave birth to 4 children. They took care of each other carefully. The two sibling doctors are very dedicated and recommend this clinic,  I am the pregnant woman. So I gave 5 stars、thank you.

originalText.text: He’s supernice and calm and very helpful

originalText.text: He delivered my 3rd child. Was very nice and gentle. I would highly recommend him.

text.text: He delivered my 3rd child. Was very nice and gentle. I would highly recommend him.

originalText.text: 我女儿在这里出生。胡兆玲医生态度很好，对病人温柔，妇科检查技术一流，基本无痛，对我来说很重要，因为我很怕痛。所以转过其他医生也转回来。唯一一点是，怀孕期间我孩子发育较慢，没有给一些很专业的意见去解决，一直什么都说沒问题，这些很平常。我剖腹产是胡兆文，产后好像没教我要注意什么，一般妇产医生会教你如何喂奶、剖腹产护理，自动麻醉药自己打多少才合理….什么也没说。

text.text: My daughter was born here. Dr. Hu Zhaoling has a very good attitude and is gentle to patients. Her gynecological examination technology is top-notch and basically painless, which is very important to me because I am very afraid of pain. So I transferred to other doctors and transferred back. The only thing is that my child's development was slow during pregnancy, and I was not given any professional advice to solve the problem. I kept saying that there was no problem. This is very common. I had a caesarean section by Hu Zhaowen. I didn’t seem to be taught anything to pay attention to after delivery. Generally, obstetricians and gynecologists will teach you how to breastfeed, take care of a caesarean section, and how much automatic anesthetic is appropriate to administer by yourself...nothing was said.
